subject: Re: [junit] (unknown)
msgSnippet: ... What happened when you put JUnit into Google? or amazon.com? ... Everything is always urgent. We know. J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software
messageBody:

What happened when you put "JUnit" into Google? or amazon.com?

>Please is my very urgent requirement.

Everything is always urgent. We know.


J. B. Rainsberger,
